name: .MFT File Extension
summary: Learn about .MFT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: XML data file used by Kaspersky Anti-Virus and Internet Security computer protection applications; contains references to files used for scanning and detecting viruses; often contains references to .KDC and .STT files.

content: MFT files begin with a <kdb> tag and include sections with <parms>, <stt>, and <kdc> tags.
In Mac OS X, the default MFT file is named kavbase.mft and is located in the /​Library/​Application Support/​Kaspersky Lab/​KAV/​Bases/​ directory.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
